F2TT.header: New tenant - Habitat & Rimbo - The new way of rent
F2TT.leftTextTwo: By filling out this form you're registering your debit card details within a secure environment. All information that you're sharing is confidential and will be used solely as a guarantee and for the purposes of replacing the payment of a deposit.
F2TT.leftTextThree: No amounts will be charged or blocked upon registration.
F2TT.name: Full name:
F2TT.subcreditcard: Remember, you must list the account where you receive your income
F2TT.warningcreditcardOne: * Authorization only, limited to the amount of 1 month of rent
F2TT.warningcreditcardTwo: * Authorization only, limited to the amount of 2 months of rent
F2TT.checkBoxOne: By sending the information above you confirm you have read and accept the

cardsuccess.title: Thank you for choosing Rimbo
cardsuccess.textOne: We have successfully received your details.
cardsuccess.textTwo: Habitat Apartments will be in touch with you in the upcoming days to formalize the rental contract.
cardsuccess.textThree: We've sent you our 'Tenant's Guide' by email to the address that you listed so you can read in detail how deposit-free renting works.
